faqs.title: How to update payment method
faqs.content: Update your payment method to ensure uninterrupted service and avoid payment failures.
solution_steps: Log into your account dashboard
Go to Billing & Payment Settings
Click 'Payment Methods'
Add new payment method or update existing
Enter card details securely
Set as default payment method if desired
Remove old payment methods if needed
Verify the update with a test transaction

faqs.title: Understanding charges on my bill
faqs.content: Get a detailed explanation of all charges and fees that appear on your monthly bill.
solution_steps: Review your detailed billing statement
Check the service period for each charge
Identify base service fees vs usage charges
Look for any one-time setup or equipment fees
Check for promotional discounts applied
Review any taxes and regulatory fees
Contact billing support for clarification
Keep records of all billing communications

faqs.title: How to dispute a charge
faqs.content: If you believe there's an error on your bill, follow these steps to dispute the charge.
solution_steps: Review your bill carefully and identify the disputed charge
Gather supporting documentation
Contact customer service within 60 days
Explain the dispute clearly with specifics
Provide any relevant account information
Follow up in writing if requested
Keep records of all dispute communications
Allow 2-3 billing cycles for resolution
